creator: ywresearch@sina.com
text:
I have two name-based virtual hosts. But when I enter either of the two urls
(http://www.a.com http://www.b.com), I always get the same web page
(http://www.a.com/index.html).

I suggest that you address you problem on a user-support forum like
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

When you do so, please be more specific about exactly what your configuration
looks like.

I'm closing this bug report now, since I am quite confident that, in general,
name-based virtual hosting works fine in 2.0. Otherwise we would have seen many
more complaints by now.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
